title: Ep. - 369 - RONNIE KARAM REVIEWS BRAVO SHOWS FATHER JAMES MARTIN FROM BUILDING BRIDGES DOCUMENTARY
description:
Ronnie Karam from Watch What Crappens podcast answers a speed round of questions about Bravo shows including Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, Real Housewives of New York, Below Deck, and Shahs of Sunset.

 

Father James Martin and Building a Bridge co-directors Evan Mascagni and Shannon Post discuss the documentary which follows a priest on his journey to make the Catholic Church more accepting of the LGBTQ+ community, despite loud opposition from both inside and outside the Church.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
